<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Reverberating Stone](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2112)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 94 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a shield

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You use the affixed shield to [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) a melee attack

**Requirement** You're a master in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3), and you have the affixed shield [raised](/Actions.aspx?ID=98).
</row>

</column>

---

This heavy metal emblem is mounted on the face of the affixed shield and has a dull gray gemstone embedded at its center. When you Activate the talisman, the gem shatters, releasing a powerful shockwave in a 15-foot cone that must include the enemy who struck the triggering blow, if possible. Each creature in the cone takes 2d6 sonic damage with a DC 28 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save. Any creature that fails its save is [pushed](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) 5 feet away from you (or 10 feet on a critical failure).
